title: Welcome, Students!
message: A warm welcome to all new and returning students. Explore new resources and connect with your tutors.

title: Tutor Training Session
message: All tutors are invited to join our upcoming training session on interactive teaching methods.

title: Admin Notice
message: Admins, please review the new platform guidelines and update your dashboard settings.

title: Platform Maintenance
message: Edu Sync will be under maintenance on July 4th from 2:00 AM to 4:00 AM UTC.

title: New Features Released!
message: We have added new features for everyone. Check out the dashboard for details and tutorials.

title: Student Survey
message: Students, please complete the feedback survey to help us improve your learning experience.

title: Tutor Q&A
message: Join our live Q&A session for tutors this Friday at 5 PM.

title: Admin System Check
message: Admins, please verify all user accounts by July 8th.

title: Summer Break Notice
message: Edu Sync will be closed for summer break from July 10th to July 15th.

title: Resource Update
message: New study materials have been added for all users.

title: Student Webinar
message: Students, join our webinar on effective study habits next week.

title: Tutor Appreciation
message: Thank you to all our tutors for your dedication and hard work!

title: Admin Meeting
message: Admins, please attend the monthly meeting on July 13th at 3 PM.

title: Platform Security Update
message: We have enhanced our security protocols for all users.

title: Student Orientation
message: Orientation for new students will be held on July 15th at 10 AM.

title: Tutor Resource Pack
message: Tutors, download the new resource pack from your dashboard.

title: Admin Dashboard Update
message: The admin dashboard has been updated with new analytics features.

title: All Users: Feedback Request
message: We value your feedback! Please fill out the feedback form on your dashboard.

title: Student Scholarship Info
message: Scholarship applications are now open for eligible students.

title: Tutor Peer Review
message: Tutors, participate in the peer review program to enhance your teaching skills.

title: Admin: System Audit
message: Admins, the annual system audit will take place on July 21st.
